mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.content, c.create_date, c.update_date, c.board_id, u.user_id, u.nickname from comment c left join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where board_id = #{boardId};
select c.comment_id, c.content, c.create_date, c.update_date, c.board_id, u.user_id, u.nickname from comment c left join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where comment_id = #{commentId};
mapper.insert: insert into comment (comment_id, content, create_date, board_id, user_id) values (#{commentId}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{boardId}, #{userId})
